argument.name: UXListName
argument.description: The name of the List control.

argument.name: filterExpn
argument.description: A filter expression to be applied to the SQL, DBF, or custom data source. You can use arguments in your expression. An argument is prefixed with a colon. For example, *[js:State = :whatstate]*

argument.name: orderExpn
argument.description: An order expression to be applied to the SQL, DBF, or custom data source.

argument.name: filterParameters
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of arguments used by the filter or having expression. Arguments are defined in the format *[js:value|||dataType|argumentName]*

argument.name: havingExpn
argument.description: A having expression for the SQL, DBF, or custom data source. You can use arguments in your expression. An argument is prefixed with a colon. For example, *[js:State = :whatstate]*

discussion.p: Performs a server-side query to filter and/or sort the data in a List that is based on a SQL, DBF, or custom data source. If the *[js:filterExpn]* or *[js:havingExpn]* use arguments, the argument values must be specified in the *[js:filterParameters]* parameter.
